columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: organisation_key
columns.dc:title: Organisation Key
columns.schema:description: A sequence of characters which uniquely identifies the provider organisation to the Primary Health Network. Assigned by the Primary Health Network.

columns.name: organisation_name
columns.dc:title: Name
columns.schema:description: The name of the provider organisation.

columns.name: organisation_legal_name
columns.dc:title: Legal Name
columns.schema:description: The legal name of the provider organisation.

columns.name: organisation_abn
columns.dc:title: ABN
columns.schema:description: The Australian Business Number of the provider organisation.

columns.name: organisation_type
columns.dc:title: Organisation Type
columns.schema:description: The category that best describes the provider organisation.

columns.name: organisation_state
columns.dc:title: State
columns.schema:description: The state that the provider organisation operates in.

columns.name: organisation_start_date
columns.dc:title: Organisation Start Date
columns.schema:description: The date on which a provider organisation started delivering services.

columns.name: organisation_end_date
columns.dc:title: Organisation End Date
columns.schema:description: The date on which a provider organisation stopped delivering services.

columns.name: organisation_tags
columns.dc:title: Organisation Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the provider organisation.
